title: Barding it up, T-pose style
body:
It occurred to me while playing good old bard as you do... That his laugh animation is suddenly a straight T-pose. As seen in the picture. I have not attempted to recreate this in multiple games or with other skins. I will post results as they come up. I thought it was fairly entertaining to squash some peeps with a good T-pose kill cam. A good 9/2/11 game to wrap it up. I'll keep you posted! 

~Izzy

replies.body: Hi hi!  Thanks for the report. We've got a fix in that should find its way to live in 8.7. Sorry about that! D:
Please don't fix this my boy needs more BM than his gangster dance spam :P
Tbh, I think this is one of the only times I've seen someone ask for a bug to be a feature. :P
With the lack of bard legendary skins for us niche memelords out here, a super Balling BM spam like this is perfect. Unfortunately its unintended. We'll get em next time i suppose
